narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.  
This was a focused inspection to ensure the Direct non-compliant item (2.40b2) identified on the 19 March 2015
inspection report was corrected.  Scarlett was examined by a veterinarian on 21 March 2015, diagnostics were
performed, and the facility is following the veterinarian's treatment plan.
 
The inspection and a verbal exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
